Urine
Your urine is checked for a 
number of things, including 
protein or ‘albumin’. If this is in 
your urine, it may mean that 
you have an infection that 
needs to be treated. It may 
also be a sign of pre-eclampsia 
(see ‘High blood pressure and 
pre-eclampsia’ on page 84).
Blood pressure
A rise in blood pressure later 
in pregnancy could be a sign 
of pre-eclampsia (see page 
84). It is very common for your 
blood pressure to be lower in 
the middle of your
